alert.note: Alert for Coastal Harris; Inland Brazoria; Inland Galveston; Inland Harris; Montgomery (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 7:32AM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Galveston, southern Montgomery, north central Brazoria and central Harris Counties through 830 AM CDT... At 731 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms over Near Northside Houston, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and training heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pasadena, Pearland, Conroe, Friendswood, Alvin, South Houston, Bellaire, Humble, West University Place, Galena Park, Tomball, Jacinto City, Webster, Jersey Village, Manvel, Hunters Creek Village, Pinehurst, Cloverleaf, Downtown Houston and Greenway / Upper Kirby Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Harris; Inland Brazoria; Inland Galveston; Inland Harris; Montgomery
